report.name: refficprj

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT pi.icpi ICPI, pi.ilibel ILIBEL, TO_CHAR(pi.datcre,'DD/MM/YYYY') DATCRE, pi.icpir ICPIR, pi2.ilibel ILIBEL_G, pi.icodproj ICODPROJ, dp.dplib DP_DPLIB, TO_CHAR(pi.cada) CADA, ca.clibrca CA_CLIBRCA, TO_CHAR(pi.datprod,'MM/YYYY') DATPROD, TO_CHAR(pi.datrpro,'MM/YYYY') DATRPRO, pi.statut STATUT, cs.libstatut LIBSTATUT, TO_CHAR(pi.datdem,'MM/YYYY') DATDEM, TO_CHAR(pi.datstatut,'DD/MM/YYYY') DATSTATUT, pi.librpb LIBRPB, pi.idrpb IDRPB, pi.clicode CLICODE, cm.clilib CLILIB, pi.imop IMOP, pi.codsg CODSG, si.libdsg LIBDSG, pi.icme ICME, pi.descr DESCR, d.libelle DB_LIB_DB, ss.libelle EA_LIB_EA, pi.dureeamor DUREEAMOR, pi.CODCAMO1 LB_CODCAMOCA1, pi.CLIBCA1 LB_CLIBCA1, pi.CODCAMO2 LB_CODCAMOCA2, pi.CLIBCA2 LB_CLIBCA2, pi.CODCAMO3 LB_CODCAMOCA3, pi.CLIBCA3 LB_CLIBCA3, pi.CODCAMO4 LB_CODCAMOCA4, pi.CLIBCA4 LB_CLIBCA4, pi.CODCAMO5 LB_CODCAMOCA5, pi.CLIBCA5 LB_CLIBCA5, decode(pi.TOPENVOI,'O','Oui','N','Non',null) TOPENVOI, TO_CHAR(pi.DATE_ENVOI,'DD/MM/YYYY') DATE_ENVOI FROM proj_info pi, dossier_projet dp, centre_activite ca, sous_systeme ss, domaine d, client_mo cm, struct_info si, proj_info pi2, code_statut cs WHERE pi.ICODPROJ = dp.DPCODE (+) and pi.cada = ca.codcamo (+) and pi.cod_db = d.code_d (+) and d.code_ss = ss.code_ss (+) and pi.icpir = pi2.icpi(+) and pi.codsg = si.codsg(+) and pi.clicode = cm.clicode(+) and pi.statut = cs.astatut(+) &P_WHERE ORDER BY pi.icpi;

textSegment.string: Date de prise en compte du statut :

function.name: afterpform
b_datstatut2formattrigger
g_datcregroupfilter
